mapper.insert: insert into item(dfw, name, contents, url, mem, itemfor, size, uuid, fileName, uploadPath, image) values(#{dfw},#{name},#{contents},#{url},#{mem},#{itemfor},#{size}, #{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{image});
mapper.select: select uuid, filename, replace(uploadpath,'\\','/') uploadpath, image, ino, dfw, name, contents, url, mem, itemfor,size from item
select uuid, filename, replace(uploadpath,'\\','/') uploadpath, image, ino, dfw, name, contents, url, mem, itemfor,size from item where ino=#{ino}
select uuid, filename, replace(uploadpath,'\\','/') uploadpath, image, ino, dfw, name, contents, url, mem, itemfor,size from item item where mem='에스쿱스'
select uuid, filename, replace(uploadpath,'\\','/') uploadpath, image, ino, dfw, name, contents, url, mem, itemfor,size from item item where itemfor='신발'
